name: BlissfulForest
0:
”Alexa, open blissful forest”
”Alexa, start blissful forest”
”Alexa, launch blissful forest”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: blissful forest
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get the rest and relaxation you deserve with the sound of nature entering your room. 
This simple to use app plays continuous high quality forest sound for as long as you like. 
Create the perfect ambiance for sleep, work, study, meditation, and soothing baby. 

Just simply say “Alexa, open Blissful Forest”
To stop just say “Alexa, Stop”
To pause just say “Alexa, Pause”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
